extendedInfo.description: Want a custom ringtone? This is a simple, very easy to use app that lets you record anything with your phone and make it into a custom ringtone, notification, or alarm! Record friends laughing or trying to sing, babies talking, or any weird, funny noise you can find, and put it on your phone as a ringtone! You can also use it as a soundboard, and keep those hilarious sounds ready when you need them.My Sounds (Make a Ringtone) is one of the easiest to use ringtone makers available! All free (banner ad supported).Features: - Easy menu system, nothing to learn or figure out- Record sounds with the touch of a button - Set sounds as either a ringtone or notificationIt keeps a saved list of your favorite recordings, so you can easily switch between ringtones.Easy and simple to use!Category: this is a custom ringtone and soundboard, with custom editing.
